p: In the present study, we observed that the secondary metabolism of medium to high polarity was highly conserved, even though N. megapotamica produced different volatile chemotypes. These compounds may remain unchanged due to basal actions that are exerted, acting as fundamental compounds for protection against ultraviolet, antimicrobial activity, response to biotic and abiotic stress, and protection against oxidative stress [ 45, 46]. The maintenance of this class of compounds may be vital for their survival.
